description: The Taiss Pro Hooded Jacket is the “big sister” of the Taiss Hardshell. Our rugged, full-featured hardshell jacket rises to any challenge in the mountains – whether climbing hard vertical ice pitches or descending long, steep couloirs. The stretch outer material is made of high-quality nylon, making it incredibly rugged. Together with a sleek cut, the jacket also ensures excellent freedom of movement. No skimping on features. It has two-way underarm ventilation zippers, internal pockets as well as spacious outer pockets placed higher up to accommodate your climbing harness. Snow sports features, such as the removable snow skirt, a small pocket for your lift pass and a helmet-compatible hood make this jacket a true all-rounder for the most seasoned mountain enthusiast. An extremely rugged, full-featured and versatile hardshell with unmatched functionality for all kinds of technical mountaineering.
name: Mammut Taiss Pro HS Hooded Jacket - Mens
